external_games.name: Hello Kitty's The Land of Hidden Objects: DokokanaArcana

name: Hello Kitty's The Land of Hidden Objects: DokokanaArcana
storyline: You have just been appointed as Arcana Kingdom's new Minister of Finding. When you collect Ornaments, the Arcana Tree regains some of its power. Finding lots of Ornaments breathes new life into the Arcana Tree and saves the kingdom from disappearing!
summary: Hello Kitty and her friends accompany you as you search and tap different hidden characters and items! Find them quickly to achieve combos and get a high score!

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: HELLO KITTY’S DokokanaArcana Android iOS Gameplay (By SANRIOWAVE)
